name: Albrechta and Coble, Ltd
tag_list: business-law, family-law, probate-and-estate-planning, civil-litigation, personal-injury, divorcedissolution, probate-administration, business-start-up, domestic-relations, general-legal-services
overview:
When you need an attorney in Northwest Ohio, turn to the lawyers of Albrechta & Coble, Ltd., your local legal solution. Based in Toledo and Fremont, we can help you with general legal matters, as our lawyers focus on personal injury cases, family law, probate and estate matters, and business law.

Our attorneys regularly practice in the federal and state courts in Northwest Ohio and have done so for decades. Our knowledge of the regional court system allows us to efficiently and effectively advocate for our clients.

At Albrechta & Coble, Ltd., we use a team approach for each case we handle. Our attorneys work closely with a talented group of paralegals. The result of this unique system means that our legal professionals are always available to answer your questions and update you on your case.
